name: Dune: Death Commando
description:
A short portfolio-piece where you take on the role of Idras: a Fedaykin Death Commando from the universe of Frank Herbert's Dune books. 

War rages on the planet Arrakis between the Fremen forces of the prophet Muad'dib and the armies of the nefarious Baron Harkonnen whose soldiers are supported by the mighty sardaukar of the Padishah Emperor himself. In the midst of this chaos, one Fremen has mysteriously abandoned his people and plans to sell valuable information to the  Harkonnen forces. It is up to you to ensure this does not happen.

Long live the fighters.
